mapper.select: SELECT t.TLSN_NUM , t.TLSN_ST_CD , t.MEM_NUM , t.LT_NUM , t.CETE_YN_CD , t.APPL_DT , r.NAME , find_code(LT_CATE_CD) LT_CATE_CD , l.LT_TTL , (SELECT LT_NUM FROM APPLEXAM e WHERE e.MEM_NUM = t.MEM_NUM AND e.LT_NUM = t.LT_NUM) AS EXAM_YN FROM TLSN t JOIN LT l ON t.LT_NUM = l.LT_NUM JOIN LECTURER r ON l.LECTURER_NUM = r.LECTURER_NUM WHERE t.MEM_NUM = #{user} ORDER BY t.APPL_DT DESC
SELECT l.LT_NUM , l.LT_TTL , l.LECTURER_NUM , e.NAME FROM LT l JOIN LECTURER e ON l.LECTURER_NUM = e.LECTURER_NUM WHERE l.LT_NUM = #{ltNum}
